data.text: Listen to this! Some day there will be a righteous king,
Each of them will be like [MET] a shelter from the wind
When that happens, those leaders will enable people who have not understood [MET] God’s truth to understand it,
Even those who act very hastily will have good sense,
At that time, people who are foolish/unwise will no longer be ◄admired/looked up to►,
Foolish people say things that are foolish,
Scoundrels do things that are evil and that deceive people;
But honorable people plan to do honorable/good things,
You women of Jerusalem who think that you are very secure/safe
One year from now, you who now ◄are not worried about anything/think that everything is going well► will tremble,
So tremble now, you women who are not worried about anything!
Beat/Hit your breasts to show that you are grieving about what will happen in your fertile fields and to your fruitful grapevines,
because only thorns and thistles will grow in your soil.
The king’s palace will be empty;
It will be like that until God pours his Spirit out on us from heaven.
People [PRS] will act/rule justly/fairly in those desert areas,
And the result of their acting righteously will be that there will be peace,
My people will live in their homes peacefully, and safely, and calmly,
Even if a severe hailstorm knocks down the trees in the forest,
Yahweh will greatly bless you;
